did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Grayson County (Va.) Tax and Fiscal Records, 1852-1965 (bulk 1852-1935)
did.physloc: State Records Center - Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Grayson County (Va.) Tax and Fiscal Records, 1852-1965 (bulk 1852-1935). Local government Records collection, Grayson County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a shipment of court papers from Grayson County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Grayson County was named for William Grayson, a delegate to the Continental Congress from 1784 to 1787 and one of the first two United States senators from Virginia. It was formed from Wythe County in 1792, and a part of Patrick County was added in 1810.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Grayson County (Va.) Tax and Fiscal Records, 1852-1965 (bulk 1852-1935) contains Land Tax Books 1852-1935 and Poll Tax List 1936-1965. There are copies of Reassessments for the period 1875 to 1915. Reassessment records were taken every five years. Personal Property Tax Books for 1872, 1874, 1877, and 1879, Delinquent Land Tax Books 1884-1913 (bulk 1892-1898,) and a County Court Clerk's Tax Book 1898-1905 are also included.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Grayson County Court Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm"

scopecontent.p: This book contains land taxes for Grayson County.

Barcode 1046901 contains Land Tax Book, 1860-1862, 1865. Barcode 1046902 contains Land Tax Book, 1866-1870. Barcode 1046903 contains Land Tax Book, 1871-1873. Barcode 1046904 contains Land Tax Book, 1874-1876. Barcode 1046905 contains Land Tax Book, 1877-1878. Barcode 1046906 contains Land Tax Book, 1879-1880. Barcode 1046907 conatins Land Tax Book, 1881-1882.

Barcode 1125303 contains Land Tax Book, 1883-1884. Barcode 1125304 contains Land Tax Book, 1884-1885. Barcode 1125305 contains Land Tax Book, 1886-1887. Barcode 1125306 contains Land Tax Book, 1888-1889. Barcode 1125307 contains Land Tax Book, 1890-1892. Barcode 1125308 contains Land Tax Book, 1893-1896. Barcode 1125309 conatins Land Tax Book, 1897-1899.

Barcode 1125310 contains Land Tax Book, 1900-1902. Barcode 1125311 contains Land Tax Book, 1903-1904. Barcode 1125312 contains Land Tax Book, 1905. Barcode 1125313 contains Land Tax Book, 1906-1907. Barcode 1125314 contains Land Tax Book, 1908-1909. Barcode 1125315 contains Land Tax Book, 1910. Barcode 1125316 conatins Land Tax Book, 1911. Barcode 1125317 contains Land Tax Book, 1912. Barcode 1125318 contains Land Tax Book, 1913. Barcode 1125319 contains Land Tax Book, 1914.

Barcode 1125320 contains Land Tax Book, 1915. Barcode 1125321 contains Land Tax Book, 1916-1917. Barcode 1125322 contains Land Tax Book, 1918. Barcode 1125323 contains Land Tax Book, 1919, 1921. Barcode 1125324 contains Land Tax Book, 1920. Barcode 1125325 contains Land Tax Book, 1922-1923. Barcode 1125326 conatins Land Tax Book, 1924-1925. Barcode 1125328 contains Land Tax Book, 1926-1927. Barcode 1125329 contains Land Tax Book, 1928-1929. Barcode 1125330 contains Land Tax Books, 1930, 1932-1933. Barcode 1125327 contains Land Tax Book, 1934-1935.
This is a broken series of poll tax books.
Barcode 1125331 contains reassessments for 1875, 1880, 1885, and 1890. Barcode 1125332 contains reassessments for 1900 and 1905. Barcode 1125332 contains reassessements for 1910 and 1915.
These books contain personal property tax lists.
Barcode 1150628 contains Delinquent Land Tax Book,1884-1889. Barcode 1150629 contains Delinquent Land Tax Book, 1892-1898. Barcode 1150627 contains Delinquent Land Tax Book, 1895-1898, 1912-1913.
This book contains list of taxes for the County Court of Grayson County.
